elements.text: You are watching a new movie at a local movie theater. As the first scene begins, you start to worry that your tremor and dyskinesia will be distracting for those sitting around you. You remember that your symptoms are out of your control, and you decide to focus on the...

elements.name: Movie Theater Distraction_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
